column4: CANADA STOCKS-TSX ends lower as TD  CIBC fall after results
column5: TORONTO  Aug 28 Canada's main stock index fell on Thursday as shares of Toronto Dominion Bank and Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce weakened after the two lenders reported quarterly results. (Editing by Jonathan Oatis)

column4: UPDATE 1-DCC eyes further expansion of energy division after Esso deal
